casebody.data:
No. 1037,

Misc.

McCray v. Illinois. Sam Adam and R. Eugene Pincham for petitioner. William G. Clark, Attorney General of Illinois, and Richard A. Michael and John J. O’Toole, Assistant Attorneys General, for respondent.

Sup. Ct. 111. Motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis and petition for a writ of certiorari granted. Case transferred to appellate docket.
